post.text: My childcare plan allows for every family in America to deduct childcare expenses from their income taxes -- MORE money in your pockets, MORE freedom to make the decisions that suit YOUR family's needs. AMERICA First means FAMILIES First!

comment.author: Travis
comment.text: "CPD Board Member Richard Parsons has contributed to Clinton. He has even spoken at the Clinton Global Initiative." Our country is ran by foundations and corporations.

replies.author: Isabel
replies.text: Hillary's ad now spouting her advocacy for children since forever. No mention of children at risk for abortion up until THE DAY OF THEIR BIRTH, and the ensuing carving up of their parts for sale to ghouls!!! You trumpanzees sure love that word. Why are you so obsesses with other people's dicks? Just call them how we see them. Man you people just look and sound more foolish with every word you manage to spew out of that tiny head of yours. Trump supporters do appear to corner the market on rudeness, name-calling, and spreading misinformation.

replies.author: Travis
replies.text: Isabel Hillary Clinton is ran by corporate enterprise and she is the corporate enterprises biggest advocate, what don't you understand about that? We need to get the money and corporations out of politics. It's documented that Hillary Clinton donates to the Commission on presidential debates or (CPD). The CPD controls the questions of the debate moderators at the presidential debates.

replies.author: Travis
replies.text: Isabel It's very apparent who the real nazi's are and it's not Trump supporters.

replies.author: Travis
replies.text: Isabel Since you want to bring this to the gutter.. Hillary supporters corner the market on stupidity and ignorance.
